name: youtube-sync-player
description: A web application to synchronize youtube videos on different browsers using WebRTC (simple-peer library is used to simply peer related WebRTC operations).   To run the application :  * Clone the repo * `npm start` in the cloned directory * `cd server` and node server to rune the server

scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix client        && npm run build --prefix client
